title: Run The Jewels – Meow The Jewels (Album Stream)
content:
We knew this was really happening, but oh shit, now it’s really happening. El-P and Killer Mike’s Meow The Jewels , a remix project that reimagines their music with sampled cat sounds, is now available for free download and stream. 
 
Listen below and head here for vinyl options. 
 

 

 
Previously: Run The Jewels – Oh My Darling Don’t Meow (Just Blaze Remix) 
         
Read the full story at Nah Right
